newsitem.title: USA: Virginia Beach, Va., approves $18 mln bond issue.
newsitem.headline: Virginia Beach, Va., approves $18 mln bond issue.

text.p: The Virginia Beach, Va., City Council approved an $18 million revenue bond issue to fund a nursing center for patients with Alzheimer's disease, the Virginian-Pilot said Wednesday.
The bonds will be issued via the Virginia Beach Development Authority, with construction set to begin in August.
